Yūgao swings her sword in a circular motion, leaving a trace of [[wikipedia:afterimage|afterimage]]s behind, which befitting the technique's name, mirrors that of a moon. Yugaō will then rush at them to deliver a blow, taking advantage of the difficulty in following her movement.
